abstract: Giorgio Armani is being celebrated for 40 years in fashion with opening of Armani Silos, museum in Milan devoted to his revolutionary fashion.
lead_paragraph: In celebration of 40 years in fashion, the opening of a new museum and his first-ever book, a tribute to the legendary designer.
